Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: We booked a family suite and it costed more than 800 a night had no A C and broken We could not switch room Paris was 38C during that 3 days we visited Then the wooden chair broke my father hit his head and back they offered us breakfast the next day and big fruit platter I am just glad he did not get hurt Overall the experience was very average Hotel relationship manager has been great to offer us help but the facilities are old and cannot keep up with its price Will not stay there again

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Staff way of speaking their was no air conditioning in my room hat to speak with them several times to change the room after changing the room the next room was also with bad air conditioning so finally at the middle of the night i had to change my room for the third time
Positive_Review: In the hotel acctually nothing

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: fantastic stay the staff has been very helpful there is a small and beautiful courtyard the restaurant is also very good with good service champs elyees and metro is just within 1 min walk

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: It was so hot in our upper room we paid extra for a duplex that none of us could sleep up there The bathroom which was upstairs was like a sauna without any bath or shower turned on We complained several times but were not given another room or a discount We only used half of the room downstairs with a family of 4 sleeping together on a pullout couch bed since it was too hot to sleep upstairs One of my sons even slept on the floor It made our experience very uncomfortable and no one at the front desk cared I called many times stopped by asking for a room change so upset I was crying DO NOT STAY HERE IF IT S HOT WEATHER IN PARIS BECAUSE ALTHOUGH THEY ADVERTISE AIR CONDITIONING IT DOES NOT WORK
Positive_Review: Bathroom was great with a nice shower and large tub Bell staff was very friendly They have a nice lounge restaurant on site

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We are only just getting used to the fact that in France you rarely if ever get offered a facecloth in the bathroom Facecloths are provided in most hotels around the world Finally went out and bought one to solve the problem Otherwise thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the California Hotel
Positive_Review: This was the first we d stayed in Paris to close to the main attractions and we loved being able to walk to many of the sites we wanted to see We had breakfast on the Champs lys es each morning walked to the Grand Palace for the Rodin exhibition walked to the Tuileries and the Louvre etc You see so many little extra slices of Parisian life this way We asked for a quiet room and were rewarded by one the back of the building looking out onto greenery The room was compact though very comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We had issue with our toilet flush the first night but they didn t have maintenance personnel to fix it They offered to move in different room but we were with our family and wanted to be on same floor When asked they said someone will be there to fix it first thing in the morning at 7am so we decided to stay in our room Morning we reminded them 4 times no one showed up until 11am It was very frustrating Also another incidence happened We had booked Rideaway from airport to hotel We planned to go too palace of Versailes the sam day after checking in We talked to the same driver and he agreed to take us of 120 00 round trip So we asked him to wait Upon checkin staff mentioned that they also have transportation available and it will cost 160 So we decided to go with the driver who brought us We wanted to freshen up so we went to our rooms Mean while my husband told them we will go with you guys and let other driver go But I immediately went down to tell Staff not to make any change and let the other driver stay backs we committed to him first we will go with him I got a call after few minutes in my room that we let other driver go and you can take our driver I wasn t happy with this They should have not interfered Staff said we settled with him and took care of him They should have not done that
Positive_Review: Very good Location Staff was friendly Hotel was clean

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Wifi at the lobby only too much noise early morning from the bars near the hotel because the window is not sound proof
Positive_Review: Near the champs elyse st only

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Internet was free but very very slow For faster internet you had to pay I didn t like that Also 25 euros for an average breakfast display is too much money Should be more reasonable
Positive_Review: Room was comfortable and quiet and clean

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I forgot my watch when called to tell I forgot in bathroom they said no watch was there which I m sure was there
Positive_Review: The location was very near the main Champselyees

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: the staff especially the very kind receptionist who gave us early check in which is something very rare to happen in Paris at least from my experience with other hotels The reception lady decided to give us the room because we were really tired from our long journey

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Check in staff was aggressive check out staff was okay The hotel was not clean at all It was an incedinet and the staff moved my room to a jenour suite The Cheif refused in an aggressive way to help preparing a special order for my family as they are allergy from some items
Positive_Review: Only staff Not even all

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast was horriable I did not had option to eat as i dont eat dairy food like cheese even after having package with breakfast was told if you want fried egg you have o be paid Incase if i visit paris and stay there will not opt for breakfast
Positive_Review: Location is great and staff are helpful Hotel is maintained very nicely and clean

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We had the issue that the in room safe was not working from the very beginning After we placed the same at the reception before the first night it has not been resolved during our stay
Positive_Review: The desk personal was friendly and helpful The American breakfast was good Offer for a room breakfast service surcharge with more options than the general breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We had another booking a few days later We requested them to keep some of our luggage since we will be coming back 4 days later They didn t accept our request
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The toilet was realy small over weight people can not fit in it this is not a joke I talked with the reception because i have one friend i plane to come with and he is over weight the told me to book rooms thats ends with 11 My room number was 529
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We are frequent world travelers use to excellent services provided by esteemed hotels as California Hotel yet we were very disappointed that when we informed them that we had chosen their hotel to celebrate our wedding anniversary they didn t offer us any complimentary services as other hotels They listed charges to every service we could chose to pay for I think a small jest from the hotel could have gone a long way
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I have asked for drop off and remind reception staff at 11 pm my flight was 4 am and driver didn t show up and staff at reception had no clue but they were kind enough to arrange taxi
Positive_Review: Location staff behavior water facility in the washroom

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: It was quite costly and they didn t do anything nice or extra for our anniversary like I had asked I mean a free coffee rose petals or cheap bottle of champagne would have cost them next to nothing and made our stay that more special They also did not honour the price from Booking com so be careful
Positive_Review: The location is great walking distance to shops and restaurants The staff all spoke English and were very helpful The lobby was elegant but the rooms a bit small and outdated

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Based on price it wasn t worth 164 as you also had city tax on top wich comes to nearly 170 no parking had to pay an extra 30 for parking Iv definately stayed on better hotels with an suite for 100 max plus we had to buy everything on top breakfast lunch or dinner if they were included on that price I would say yes it would be worth it but it wasn t
Positive_Review: Was very close to city centre shops and attractions and eiffel tower

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Used to having super king bed to myself do bit cramped to share double with my husband
Positive_Review: Looked like it had just been decorated no dust or cobwebs anywhere

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Limited variety of TV channels offer mainly aimed at an Arab audience
Positive_Review: 1 Perfect location 2 Quality of the 2 connected rooms we booked 3 Tasteful breakfast 4 Quality and attractive appearance and design of the public spaces

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a little average for the luxury of the hotel Eggs made to order espresso included would be the perfect touch
Positive_Review: We booked this last minute and couldn t have been happier Would go back again and again bed was super comfy and the pillows were amazing Lots of space plus wonderful staff Loved our visit

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Room lacked some basic items such as slippers Temperature control was a little fiddly and room kept getting too warm or too cold
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Staff were very friendly and helpful especially the receptionists and door men Room size was quite decent for a centrally located hotel in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Being a family with a baby we have requested a baby crib it was dirty and not up to the hotel standard
Positive_Review: Perfect location short walking distance to the Champs Elysees Clean Cheerful staff and special thanks to Aysha from the house keeping for her lovely spirit and smile Receptionist at the check in time

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The check in staff were very close to being rude No charm at all Felt like we were treated as a nuisance rather than valued guest Kept waiting for 30 mins even though it was 4pm and we had been advised by booking com we could check in early Likewise check out was equally poor Asked if we could check out late as advised by booking com we could subject to availablity When we requested this were told no message had been received fair enough but the answer was still no until later I showed my booking com email and then they said yes and we should have showed the email Which made me feel they simply didn t believe me the first time I asked Bottom line is for a 4star hotel I feel we were poorly treated A pity as check in day was my Birthday and not even good wishes were forthcoming Will find another hotel next time
Positive_Review: Location is great and the hotel is comfortable for a city break Breakfast was fine not great eggs were cold but overall just about okay

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: shower water adjustments can be improved with single adjustments better air ventilation in toilets non heated WC bidet pressure was too high
Positive_Review: spacious room sofa bed

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: They ask for deposite too much money as guarantee around 400
Positive_Review: Location Very very Helpful and friendly staff e g Ayoub Radhoun Nabil and Farid Thanks a lot to Radhoaun for extended our stay few hours before check out

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Expensive breakfast for what was available But other than that a lovely hotel
Positive_Review: The bar and restaurant was comfortable although breakfast was expensive Better to eat out

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Hotel took 1 000 Euro off our credit card at the beginning of our stay as an imprint but it physically left our credit card At the end of our stay the hotel has charged us our full bill again instead of using the imprint money meaning we have effectively paid for the hotel twice 3 days and counting after we have checked out and we are still waiting for the 1 000 euro imprint to be put back on our credit card
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff lovely clean rooms Buffet breakfast was great

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I had emailed the hotel prior saying it was my other halfs birthday and for them to organise something special for him and i didnt mind paying nothing was organised staff were not helpful location wise it is great but thats about it the rooms are really dated
Positive_Review: location

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast could be improved to add more hot meal choices
Positive_Review: The best part of my stay was meeting a very friendly staff He made me feel so welcomed my stay was really a pleasant one

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Everything was exceptional apart from the fact the hotel dosnt have a price list in the room for the mini bar so just be careful as this did prove to be more expensive than what I thought it would be Still this did not Hinder our lovely stay at the Hotel
Positive_Review: I decided to take my wife to Paris as a surprise trip and chose to stay at Hotel California This was the best decision I made the staff were friendly and the hotel was clean and comfy The hotel were aware of our anniversary and surprised us with a free room upgrade which made our experience that extra bit special Then we went up to our room to find fresh rose petals scattered all over our room with a teddy holding a card on the bed which read Happy Anniversary Never have we felt so welcomed by a hotel before let alone in another country The Hotel California team has given us memories to cherish for the rest of our lives Thank you

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Refusal by staff to check me in till paying 100 in cash deposit didn t accept credit card payment Power shut for over an hour no apology given
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was very small and facing an internal shaft which made it even more catastrophic This was probably the smallest room I had every slept in A little disappointing for a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: This was our second time at this Hotel as the location is fantastic Staff was also very helpful and room was given to us before 3pm

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Initially we were booked into a room on the 6th floor Location wasn t great on the roof next to the aircon Then when we entered the room with our keycard the previous occupant hadn t checked out yet Suitcases bed unmade etc pretty bad show Reception handled it well They apologised profusely and then gave us a free upgrade and a member of staff accompanied us to check the new room No further problems but that initial error was a bad one
Positive_Review: Location was great hotel itself was great too Staff friendly professional

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The service was really terrible The staff weren t friendly we wanted to upgrade beds but they wouldn t help us despite the fact that we were willing to pay more Manager was very rude I will not be coming back to this hotel nor will I recommend it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The bathrooms are flooding the tv didn t work always have to ask for reparation And innovation in building next to hotel did not let us sleep And rate of room was too high
Positive_Review: Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Had to request an iron as one not in room and had to request twice as took over 35 mins to arrive Iron was faulty and ironing board was about 2 ft long to work on table too but kept collapsing Which was dangerous For 4x did not supply water in room and charged 7 euros a bottle to make a drink with Very poor
Positive_Review: Supposed to be superior room but very small Bathroom was tiny and glass top on dresser was cracked with sharp edge

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The price was cheeper on the website Plus the room wasnt the same as the one i booked so i had to upgrade I had 2 problems which was the bed was broken and the shower they said they have fixed it but its not
Positive_Review: The location

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The arabic reception his name nader he is from eygpt no respect for gusts he was full of hates the franchise front desk girls feel shame from his bad wards
Positive_Review: Rooms

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: They doubled charged me for the last day They charged the Visa card when I arrived for a extra day that I added upon arrival They never took it off the invoice and in fact added 500 to my invoice plus the 447 they already charged my card The staff was very good except for these errors
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room is very small There is no many options in the brakfast
Positive_Review: The staff is friendly talking more than one language arabic english frinch The room is clean decorated nicely The location is perfect a few mins to champ elsees

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Hotel gave us one of the rooms without air conditioning and then they started to fix it When they couldn t do anything they offered a 30 discount on that room
Positive_Review: Location is fantastic

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The staff was not helpful for 6 days and did not fix the path rooms after 8 complaints and the managers refused to see to discuss my complain but after insisting he met me twice unless he knows why The parking is very poor and the team is not organized every day during my stay I do self parking in the hote and they are charging a valet parking price Last time to stay in this hotel
Positive_Review: The location only

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Cleaning staff were a little unpleasant and were pushy to get us out in the morning Other than that nothing to fault A great stay
Positive_Review: Splendid stay at Hotel California The staff were super friendly and helpful We loved the free mobile phone service during our stay We were surprised at how quiet the room was given its location Two minute walk to the Champs lys es was very convenient The breakfast was also wonderful

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast was not included and costed 20 euro I went for the a la carte option thinking to save a bit on this but should have thought again I agreed with the hostess I d tell her what I d get from the buffet and she d calculate it for me So I ordered fried eggs for 7 euro and took a coffee and 2 slices of bread For the latter she charged me hold on to your seats 11 euros She told me she couldn t charge me differently as she could only charge me for a full bread so I had to pay 11 euro for 2 tiny slices of bread All together it was 23 euros so the next morning I was a clever boy again and just went for the full buffet for 20 euro What a scam though even in Paris
Positive_Review: Very proper hotel to Parisian standards but as with all hotels in Paris I find also this one overpriced But at least you get something in return Located on a sidestreet of Champs Elysees is

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: This was second time at Hotel I love it It is perfect for my get aways The staff is always happy Atian in Bar is funny and nice Farrid at front desk others were all wonderful made researvetions at all places we wanted Sorry about spelling

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Tried hard but can t think of one thing we didn t like
Positive_Review: This is a lovely relaxed well appointed hotel Very professional and friendly staff Reception staff very helpful and upgraded us to a beautiful room overlooking the courtyard The bar manager even remembered what we drank after having previously had one short visit to the lounge bar The location is excellent just off the Champs Elysees with very good restaurants just along the street Le Carpaccio being our favourite Overall we would highly recommend this hotel and look forward to returning again soon

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I was a disappointed when I was unable to cancel a car service which cost me double the cost to get to the airport It was my last impression on my final moments in Paris The morning service was supported by staff members which seemed detached and uninterested the exception was the young female trainee who served with a smile On Sunday morning the service was non existent
Positive_Review: The Front Desk staff was helpful A very pleasant young woman checked us in and made a reservation for our party and the night desk man Beshoy were very helpful in getting us settled for a pleasant week

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: They debited amount of miney although it was a free cancelltion policy and even when paying the bill they didnt count the money they blocked and i made a problem to get back the money they blocked a week before arrival
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: no breakfast offered with the booking AC in my room wasn t working and though we have complained it wasn t fixed if you choose this hotel to stay make sure they do not give you room 502 AC is not working in that room
Positive_Review: location was great staff were very helpful room was wide and beautiful we had a free upgrade

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The airconditioning was not working properly all the time
Positive_Review: The bed was okay and the toilet and bath were spic and span The room size was not bad either Because we were leaving on a late flight they allowed us to stay in the room until 2 PM and left our luggage in storage before leaving for CDG

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room could have been better soundproofed and the 2 single beds lashed together we re not great However the good outweighed the bad
Positive_Review: Front desk staff were great so helpful and attentive Location was fantastic walkable to most places and in a quiet street but still on the edge of the action Excellent cocktails

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: the check in check out was tediously slow the bath and shower in room 327 was dreadful
Positive_Review: the restuarant was good and the service there was excellent

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Poor dining arrangement there is need for future expansion
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent and polite room was very nice and comfy bed though The premise sparkling

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The breakfast is poor related to the price paid 25 euro very few choice of fresh fruit no fresh juices etc
Positive_Review: The hall is very nice and the room very quiet

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Bed was a little hard and limited British tv channels other than news
Positive_Review: Excellent location around 50 yards from the Avenue Champs Eleyesses Room was very nice with everything you could want

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Parking is too expensive And not easy to hop in and of to the hotel Room service and Resturant close to early
Positive_Review: Rooms are big and spacious Bathroom is outstanding and Arab style Air conditioning Family friendly hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Room Service closes at mid night Room Service takes EUR4 for any service or visit to your room I ordered a knife and they took 4EUR for bringing me a knife House Keeping did not change my towels or my bed sheets for 4 nights When you take a shower water will be everywhere in the bathroom Shower place is not cover enough Value for money should be better
Positive_Review: Reception staff are very nice and helpful Location is excellent Hotel is well known among taxi drivers There is a good heater in the bathroom

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Little bit high room rates Breakfast dose not have varity of selection for Muslims
Positive_Review: Frindely and helpful staff gives a very good recommendation for Resturants and activities extremely comfortable rooms room toilet is outstanding

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The fitness room can do with some renovation and better equipment
Positive_Review: The location is excellent and staff are very friendly helpful and speak different languages

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Shower needs thermostatic mode It constantly turned from cold to very hot
Positive_Review: Wonderful new decorated rooms excellent beds best servicing staff ever From now my favorite stay in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: From arrival to departure the staff were warm friendly and helpful Nothing was too much trouble and all staff were courteous and happy to engage with us Our room was comfortable and quiet and for Paris standards a good size with everything we needed Breakfast was usual fayre with good choice and well presented Ideal location just a 100m off the Champs Elysees and all the attractions George V metro 5mins walk

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We did not opt to pay for the breakfast as it was too pricey
Positive_Review: The location was ideal The hotel was very clean The staff were very pleasant and helpful I would recommend the hotel and will stay there again

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We left some personal items behind We rang the day we left to let them know and house keeping was not available The next day they stated nothing was found in the room and were extremely unhelpful and disinterested Just not acceptable and has completely spoilt the experience
Positive_Review: Good location

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Just at the end A a girl from the staff members was not so nice or cooperative as the other staff and that made a difference specially when there was an issue with the invoice that was later fixed by her manager
Positive_Review: The hotel was awesome

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The hotel location is perfect the staff is friendly and they helped me alot to plan my holiday for the NYE tours restaurants etc I would highly recommend this hotel if you want to be close to champs elys es with decent price

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The cost of the hotel was pretty expensive
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely friendly beds were comfortable and the shower had hot water There was a balcony too but extremely small nothing wrong with that as most balconies in Paris are small

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful in guiding me towards finding the right stores and getting the right transportation They were also accommodating when I decided to extend my stay an extra day

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No iron No slippers Breakfast not included No tooth brush and no tooth paste No plug for shaver in bathroom Arabic channels is limited
Positive_Review: Location and staff

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: poor service ignorant front desk lack of info during terror attacks no sauvignon blanc no bath despite upgrade very small room despite upgrade no recognition of being regular return guest
Positive_Review: position pictures porters

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Nothing Felt very secure Staff very helpful
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff we were there during the terrorist attacks and we came home a day early and the hotel refunded the night we weren t there which was much appreciated Excellent service

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We were a bit disappointed by the breakfast we never had it At the check in we were told that on weekends the breakfast is until 11 30 I double checked and asked if they are sure Yes they told me it s until 11 30 The next day we were down at 11 10 the restaurant was closed At the check out I asked about the breakfast and was again told that it is until 11 30 on weekends when I told about our experience they made a poker face and told me that they made a mistake Not even a hint of apology
Positive_Review: Our second visit to this hotel after about 7 8 years Great location Nice for some shopping or business

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room is quite small for the price paid and it was also very dusty The buffet breakfast was terrible I would not recommend it for the price we paid 25 per person I also was not happy on arrival they charged us an additional 570 on top of the price of our room as a holding fee for any facilities that we may have used during our time spent there This was not notified to us prior to our arrival On checkout I was told this money would immediately be refunded and in my account within the next hour Three days later I am still waiting for the refund We also ate dinner here one of the evenings it was very basic not great at all
Positive_Review: The Location is terrific small side street right on the champs Elysee The street is nice and quiet at night All the staff were very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The staff was so friendly and helpful I had a lot of luggage because my daughter was moving to Paris and they accommodated me I loved the service in the restaurant and the food was excellent especially the dessert

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Weak breakfast and room service single beds in double room Only one shower in 4 guests expensive suit Old furniture
Positive_Review: Friendly staff good transport facility

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I had booked two room Both rooms had the toilet seat jammed between the wall and the shower if you are really thin then it will be no problem for you On of our rooms had children with their nanny in it and they were noise and loud Their parents were in another room on a different floor
Positive_Review: It is close to the Champs lys es

Hotel_Name: H tel California Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Front desk people are not kind Need to check the bill when you checkout Do not use the Hotel Taxi because it is 50 expensive than normal taxi
